import React from "react";
import PropTypes from "prop-types";
import {extend,uniqueId} from "lodash";
import {cx} from "emotion";
 
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
 
import getCheckboxStyle from "../styles/checkbox/checkbox.style";
 
export class Checkbox extends React.Component {
 
  onChange = (e)=>{
    const onChange = this.props.onChange || this.inputProps.onChange;
    if (onChange) {
 
      const input = e.target;
      const name = (e.target && e.target.name) || null;
      let value = (input || null) && input.checked;
 
      if (value === true) {
        value = this.props.checkedValue;
      }
      else if (value === false) {
        value = this.props.uncheckedValue;
      }
 
      onChange(e,name,value);
 
    }
 
  }
 
 
  render() {
 
    const {
      id: _id,
      error,
      inverted,
      fluid,
      size,
      checkboxType,
      name,
      checked,
      value,
      checkedValue,
      uncheckedValue,
      label,
      containerProps: _containerProps,
      children,
      ...otherProps
    } = this.props;
 
 
    let id = _id;
 
    if (!id) {
      Eif (!this.id) {
        this.id = uniqueId("checkbox_");
      }
      id = this.id;
    }
 
    var inputProps = extend({
      id,
      name,
    },otherProps,{
      onChange: this.onChange,
      value: null,
      type: "checkbox"
    });
 
    const styleFlags = {
      fluid,
      error,
      inverted,
    };
 
    Iif (checkboxType) {
      styleFlags[checkboxType] = true;
    }
    else {
      styleFlags.checkbox = true;
    }
 
    const containerClassName = cx("cm-checkbox",getCheckboxStyle(styleFlags,size));
 
 
    const containerProps = mergeProps({
      className: containerClassName,
    },_containerProps);
 
    inputProps.checked = checked || value === checkedValue;
 
    Eif (inputProps.value === null) { inputProps.value = undefined; }
 
    /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/label-has-for */
    return (
      <div {...containerProps}>
        <input {...inputProps} />
        <label htmlFor={id}>{label}</label>
      </div>
    );
    /* eslint-enable jsx-a11y/label-has-for */
  }
}
 
Checkbox.propTypes = {
  onChange: PropTypes.func,
  checkedValue: PropTypes.any,
  uncheckedValue: PropTypes.any,
};
 
Checkbox.defaultProps = {
  checkedValue: true,
  uncheckedValue: false
};
 
Checkbox.isCheckbox = true;
 
 
export function Slider(props) {
  return <Checkbox checkboxType="slider" {...props} />;
}
 
Slider.isCheckbox = true;
 
export function Toggle(props) {
  return <Checkbox checkboxType="toggle" {...props} />;
}
 
Toggle.isCheckbox = true;
